description: Wanpo is one of http://anidb.net/ch12791 [Hachi]`s sons. http://anidb.net/ch12790 [Nekota] gave him to http://anidb.net/ch23 [Ippo] soon after http://anidb.net/ch23 [Ippo] won the Japanese Featherweight Championship. His name is a combination of English and Japanese to form a pun on http://anidb.net/ch23 [Ippo]`s name, which literally means "one step". One pronounced using Japanese syllables is Wan (ワン, One).
name: Wanpo
